errors.verifyAccountInfo:
Double check your email and password! 
And if your account exists!

errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen that your users will see in production when an error is thrown. You'll want to customize this message (located in `app/i18n/en.json`) and probably the layout as well (`app/screens/error`). If you want to remove this entirely, check `app/app.tsx` for the <ErrorBoundary> component.

purchaseScreen.messageCheck: *The money will be deposited in your account once the check is accepted
